We are accepting abstracts that showcase the many ways our diverse community uses R. Share with the audience how you use R in your professional career or for personal projects. Additionally, we would love to hear from the data practitioners who use R to raise awareness of LGBTQ+ issues. The types of abstracts we are accepting include:

- **Regular talks** (30 minutes)
- **Lightning talks** (2-5 minutes) which will be pre-recorded
- **Posters** to be presented virtually in the virtual app Gather 

## Deadlines
- **December 15th:** Submit your abstract
- **February 15th:** Submit your pre-recorded videos (lightning talk)
- **February 23rd:** Upload your posters to BLAH

Submit your abstract with this [form](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HUgwM1Ky228)
